channel.title: CVE Feed for silabs.com -- GSDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for silabs.com -- GSDK

item.title: CVE-2024-22473|2024-09-27T16:06:44.910Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: TRNG is used before initialization by ECDSA signing driver when exiting EM2/EM3 on Virtual Secure Vault (VSE) devices. This defect may allow Signature Spoofing by Key Recreation.This issue affects Gecko SDK through v4.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-5138|2024-09-27T15:36:34.657Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: Glitch detection is not enabled by default for the CortexM33 core in Silicon Labs secure vault high parts EFx32xG2xB, except EFR32xG21B.

item.title: CVE-2023-2747|2024-09-27T16:19:34.634Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: The initialization vector (IV) used by the secure engine (SE) for encrypting data stored in the SE flash memory is uninitialized.
